Title: What is a Foundation Model? An Explainer for Non-Experts
Link to article: https://hai.stanford.edu/news/what-foundation-model-explainer-non-experts
Citation: What is a Foundation Model? An Explainer for Non-Experts. 2023. Available from: https://hai.stanford.edu/news/what-foundation-model-explainer-non-experts
Abstract: These powerful machine learning algorithms sit at the core of many generative AI tools today. Check out this helpful video from Stanford HAI  to learn more!
